channel.title: Coding on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil

item.title: Useful Tips to Help You with Starting Your First Professional Project
item.description: If you have a CS background, then you are bound to have encounters with professional projects. Before starting one, you should keep a few things in mind; otherwise, working could be a bit difficult. Here are some tips for a jump start in your professional project development. Table of contents  Knowing your stakeholders All IDEs are good IDEs Git is your friend Keeping only one copy of the project Knowing your project environment Checking the test cases Being aware of the culture Not being afraid In conclusion Knowing your stakeholders Before starting the project, it is a good idea to talk with the stakeholders of this project.
